com.team4001.lib.util

Interface GyroDrive

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DriveTrain4VictorEncGyro, DriveTrain4VictorGyro

    public interface GyroDrive
    Interface containing methods for a drivetrain with a gyro
    Author:
    eric

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void driveAngle(double setAngle, double speed)
      Used to move robot without a drive PID controller at a given speed, while at the angle given.
      double getYaw()
      This method returns the current yaw(angle) of the gyro
      void initGyro()
      Initialize gyro object.
      void resetGyro()
      Reset the Gyro
      void turnDrive(double setAngle, double speed, double epsilon)
      Using a PID controller, turns the robot to given angle with the given speed.

    • Method Detail

      • initGyro

        void initGyro()
        Initialize gyro object. Contructor needs to call this.

      • driveAngle

        void driveAngle(double setAngle,
                double speed)
        Used to move robot without a drive PID controller at a given speed, while at the angle given.
        Parameters:
        setAngle - The set angle in degrees
        speed - The speed (-1.0 - 1.0)

      • getYaw

        double getYaw()
        This method returns the current yaw(angle) of the gyro
        Returns:
        the current angle of the gyro

      • resetGyro

        void resetGyro()
        Reset the Gyro

      • turnDrive

        void turnDrive(double setAngle,
               double speed,
               double epsilon)
        Using a PID controller, turns the robot to given angle with the given speed.
        Parameters:
        setAngle - The set angle in degrees
        speed - The speed (0.0 - 1.0)
        epsilon - How close robot should be to target to consider reached
